snippet.title: PC Game - Delta Force
snippet.description:
PC Game - "Delta Force" by NovaLogic.  Now this is an "old" classic. haha. By old, I mean 1998 old. This game requires what, DirectX 5?  But even so, it still runs via Software Render making it hard to record. Fraps is not able to record Software Render, so I had to record this with CamStudio in various modes, Window mode, Full screen modes (which messes things up), lots of cropping because the video came out wrong, came out choppy etc. 

I remember the fun old days (around 2000?) of playing LAN with my cousins or brothers. Those were the days when the computers we had could barely do 512x384 ingame graphics and was choppy. Maximum at 800x600 but because it is Software Render, the graphics is no match for today's standard 800x600 graphics, not close. 

Just something from the old days (a decade ago, has it been that long?)...
